contents.content: UNIT 01 求职准备 Job Hunting Preparation
Lesson 8 询问职缺 Inquiring about Job Vacancies
杰克和玛丽在谈论公司的职位空缺情况。

contents.title: 杰克：玛丽，你不是找到几个有意向的公司了吗？
contents.answer: Jack: Mary, you have found several companies that are hiring, right?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，一共有3个。
contents.answer: Mary: Yes, I have found three companies.

contents.title: 杰克：你打电话咨询职位情况了吗？
contents.answer: Jack: Have you called to inquire about the positions?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，不过结果并不是很理想。
contents.answer: Mary: Yes, but the results are not so satisfying.

contents.content: 公司或企业既然招聘员工，就说明其内部某些岗位存在着人员空缺，需要进行招聘。求职者只有了解到公司的职位空缺情况，才能投其所需，找到属于自己的工作岗位。

contents.title: 杰克：怎么回事？
contents.answer: Jack: What's the matter?

contents.title: 玛丽：我问第一家公司的职位空缺情况，他们说这个职位已经招到人了。
contents.answer: Mary: I asked the first company about the vacancy, but they had already hired someone.

contents.title: 杰克：真是可惜！
contents.answer: Jack: What a pity!

contents.title: 玛丽：第二家公司说那个职位信息是他们公司半年前发布的，已经过期了。
contents.answer: Mary: The second one told me that the job information was released half a year ago, and had been overdue.

contents.title: 杰克：这太烦人了！
contents.answer: Jack: It's frustrating!

contents.title: 玛丽：最后那个公司还在招聘，不过不招应届毕业生。
contents.answer: Mary: The last company is still hiring, but not recent graduates.

contents.content: 一般说来，招聘单位在发布的招聘信息中所列举的工作岗位就是现在所空缺的岗位，是需要引起求职者注意的。求职者在网上或是通过其他方式获悉招聘单位的职位空缺后，可以打电话进行咨询，确认招聘信息是否属实，或者是直接到公司进行询问，再做进一步的打算。

contents.title: 杰克：怎么会这样？
contents.answer: Jack: Wonder why they do that!

contents.title: 玛丽：我现在感觉糟透了。
contents.answer: Mary: I feel terrible now.

contents.title: 杰克：别灰心，继续努力，你肯定能找到的。
contents.answer: Jack: Don't be discouraged. Just keep trying and you will find a job eventually

contents.title: 玛丽：谢谢你的支持与关心。
contents.answer: Mary: Thanks for your support and care.

contents.content: 在咨询职位空缺时，可直奔主题，直接询问该公司所招聘的职位是否还需要人员，请求给予面试机会。也可以采用迂回战略，通过询问公司的其他情况再过渡到职位招聘上来，说不定会有意外的收获。如果询问的职位已经招到人了，就可以继续寻找下一个应聘目标了。

contents.title: 我想打电话咨询一下公司的职位情况。
contents.answer: I want to call the company to ask about hiring information.

contents.title: 如有任何疑问，请打电话咨询公司的人事部。
contents.answer: If you have any questions, please call the company's personnel department.

contents.title: 公司还在招人吗？
contents.answer: Is the company still hiring?

contents.title: 请问公司还有职位空缺吗？
contents.answer: Does the company still have job vacancies?

contents.title: 公司的这个职位信息还有效吗？
contents.answer: Is your company's position information still valid?

contents.title: 我想了解一下公司的职位空缺情况。
contents.answer: I want to know about the company's job vacancies.

contents.title: 我在网上查到你们公司需要招聘一个秘书。
contents.answer: I find out on the Internet that your company needs a secretary.

contents.title: 我可以应聘你们公司的经理一职吗？
contents.answer: May I apply for your company's manager position?

contents.title: 你们公司的这个职位招到合适的人了吗？
contents.answer: Have you hired someone for your company's position?

contents.title: 我对你们公司的这个职位很感兴趣，我可以试试吗？
contents.answer: I am very interested in your company's position; can I give it a try?
